main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported over Vero Beach, Florida, on various dates in June 1954.
interesting points: On 17 June 1954, a green circular object was observed changing colors and at an estimated altitude of 1,000 ft.,Sightings reported on 8 June 1954 included 3 witnesses who described a circular object traveling at high speed and disappearing within seconds,One observation noted a flight of 3-5 bright, disc-shaped objects at about 2,000 ft. altitude seen for approximately 15 minutes on 13 June 1954,A Marine Corps Intelligence Officer reported a pulsating light observed at an elevation of 45 degrees on 13 June 1954,The sightings all had witnesses considered reliable, with consistent stories throughout.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects (circular, disc-shaped, brilliant lights)
witness description: Civilians and military personnel including Marine Corps Intelligence Officers
